name: Personal Care and Beauty Products
description: Personal care and beauty products that prioritize natural ingredients, sustainable sourcing, and eco-friendly packaging.

name: Clothing and Apparel
description: Clothing and apparel made from sustainable materials, produced under fair labor conditions, and designed to minimize environmental impact.

name: Home and Household Products
description: Household products and home goods made from environmentally friendly materials, with a focus on sustainability and reduced ecological footprint.

name: Food and Beverages
description: Food products and beverages that prioritize organic ingredients, fair trade practices, and sustainable agriculture methods.

name: Outdoor and Recreation
description: Outdoor gear and recreational products designed for outdoor activities, travel, and adventure, with a focus on sustainability and environmental stewardship.
